comment.author: 8139976@N03
comment._content: According to Jay Schwartz' (FockerJ7) Bucket The picture shows D.I 2406/16, one of three built examples. The data about this aircraft are a little bit sketchy. According to my sources: Type: FF.46 Military designation: D I Year: Autumn 1916 Crew: 1 Engine: 1 160hp Mercedes DIII Wing Span: 9.04m Length: 6.45m Height: 2.90m Empty Weight: 665kg Max.Weight: 901kg Speed: ?? Ceiling: ?? Range: ?? Armament: 1 7,92 mm Spandau (s272.photobucket.com/user/FOKKERJ7/media/BandRFriedrichsh...)
